title: In would be handy if StandardRequestHandler returned an error when a query requested sorting on a non-indexed field
description: Currently if you send Solr a query which includes a sorting specification, and the field you're trying to sort on is not indexed, then there's no error response, but the result returned isn't sorted.

comments.author: Hoss Man
